markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Gangs of Absalom](/Articles.aspx?ID=27)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 68

Examine the desperate and violent gangs that terrorize the people of Absalom, from the bloodthirsty Eyegougers to the anarchic Warhounders.
name: Gangs of Absalom
